/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the street, their facades a testament to the architectural diversity of the city. A large tree stands as a solitary figure amidst the concrete jungle, its leaves a splash of green against the urban backdrop. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
